channel.title: Help me get no-ip working you can be my co owner
channel.description:
I want to have a no-ip but i dont know how my router is a d-link di-634M and im not sure if im forwarding my ports right or something but there used to be a tut but i cant find it... so please post one or tell me how here
if you can help me gett it working you are worthy of being my co owner and shall be rewarded accrodingly! [br][size=1]Posted on: June 20, 2007, 03:32:13 PM[/size][hr]GRARGH HELP ME!

item.title: Help me get no-ip working you can be my co owner
item.dc:creator: @MrMoon MrMoon
item.description:
@MrMoon wrote:

First of all can u get into your router? If so read here

  1. click on advanced setting in the router screen.
  2. click port forwarding on the side
  3. Fill out the forms like this
    Enabled
    Name: Runescape(doesnt matter)
    TCP Ports to Open:43594
    UDP Ports to open:43594
    Firewall Rule: Allow all
    Schedule:always

Click on apply

Read full topic
item.source: Help me get no-ip working you can be my co owner
